thread.title: Patriot Coal in ‘Advanced’ Talks With Rival Bidder for Mines
thread.title_full: Patriot Coal in ‘Advanced’ Talks With Rival Bidder for Mines - WSJ

author: Jacqueline Palank
title: Patriot Coal in ‘Advanced’ Talks With Rival Bidder for Mines
text:
Talks with a rival bidder for Patriot Coal Corp.’s mining assets are in an “advanced” stage and could yield a competitive auction, according to the company’s lawyer.
Patriot attorney Stephen Hessler on Wednesday told a bankruptcy judge that the company’s... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
